name: Gentle Slope
description: A straightforward hole with a gentle left-to-right slope. Perfect for beginners to practice reading breaks.

name: Dogleg Right
description: A challenging dogleg right that requires precise aim and distance control. The green has multiple tiers.

name: Water Hazard Challenge
description: A nerve-testing hole with water hazard along the right side. The green has subtle undulations that are difficult to read.

name: Bunker Alley
description: A strategic hole with bunkers on both sides creating a narrow alley to the green. Precision is key.

name: Double Break
description: An expert-level hole featuring a double breaking putt that challenges even the most skilled golfers.

name: The Long Putt
description: Test your distance control with this extra long putting challenge. Requires both power and finesse.

name: Challenging Elevation
description: A severe uphill putt that tests your ability to judge speed and power on an elevated green.

name: The Island Green
description: An intimidating island green surrounded by water. Mental focus is key to conquering this challenging hole.

name: Championship Finisher
description: A true test of skill combining multiple challenges: elevation change, a severe break, and a narrow target zone.
